content: Follow the stream upriver near the ramp and stick to the left to find a marshy area full of white reed flowers, and the boss will leap out of its lair to attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the stream upriver near the ramp and stick to the left to find a marshy area full of white reed flowers, and the boss will leap out of its lair to attack.
